New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 92 off 41 balls, his fastest T20 fifty
India reached 100 in 8.4 overs, their quickest century in a T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took crucial wickets, including Travis Head's dismissal
Pre-Game Insights: The match was played despite overnight showers
Mitchell Starc was brought back into the Australian team
Post-Match Reflections: India's win set them up for the semifinal against England
Miscellaneous Highlights: Impact of wind conditions on the match
Strategic changes by bowlers during the game
